Hot take: "DeFi" is a terrible term that only resonates with those already deeply in the Ethereum space. I hate it.  What is being built has the chance to transform the financial sector but it won't happen if it doesn't capture an external audience.

I really think that people who say "Ethereum will never scale" should think about if they mean "a stateful permissionless blockchain with expressive smart contracts will never scale", and if not, why those are separate questions. Most altcoins are just brands, not specific techs.
